name: Clone Me Once
description:
Clone Me Once is a puzzle-platformer game in a 2D style that has you clone yourself to progress in these small but yet fun level's to reach the end point making you think on how to accomplish this. How many tries will it take you to reach the end?

Updates V1.0.4 includes:

Controller scheme for the options menu to show what controls what.

Warning for first time launch to say that the keybinds are set. Currently you cannot see them till it is reloaded so in the meantime it tells you to restart for first time setup.

Controls showing in game for map 1 to just kind of indicate how to progress.

Disabled v-sync as a startup setting as this can cause tearing, if you would prefer it on though then the setting remains.
